The
Public
School Meetings Archive 2009-2016

2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016

This is a list of meetings that took place at The Public School between 2009-2016, extracted from the Wayback Machine. The individual meetings link to the Wayback Machine’s captures, but may not work in all cases.

In 2007, The Public School was initiated in Los Angeles in the basement of Telic Arts Exchange. The Public School was a school with no curriculum. It was not accredited, did not give out degrees, and it had no affiliation with the public school system. It was a framework that supported autodidactic activities, operating under the assumption that everything is in everything.
